title: [1.12.2]低配版寒冰剑!某不科学的寒冰剑
author: xiaodan_979791
txt_content:
本帖最后由 xiaodan_979791 于 2020-2-28 16:40 编辑 

视频链接：https://www.bilibili.com/video/av62784831
拒绝白嫖，从我做起
详解在视频里，指令在视频简介里

注意：视频里有对武器的展示和对指令详细的描述
指令：武器获取指令：/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {display:{Name:"冰霜剑",Lore:["Q键技能：冰封附近生物"]}}
计分版创建1：/scoreboard objectives add ice dummy
计分版创建2：/scoreboard objectives add bhtime dummy
命令方块1：/scoreboard players tag [url=home.php?mod=space&uid=1702895]@e[type=item][/url] add bs {Item:{id:"minecraft:diamond_sword",tag:{display:{Name:"冰霜剑",Lore:["Q键技能：冰封附近生物"]}}},OnGround:1b}
命令方块2：/execute @e[type=item,tag=bs] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @p[r=5] add bs2
命令方块3：/execute @e[type=item,tag=bs] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @p[r=5] add bs3
命令方块4：/execute @e[type=item,tag=bs] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @e[r=7,tag=!bs2] add bh
命令方块5：/kill @e[type=item,tag=bs]
命令方块6：/execute @e[tag=bh] ~ ~ ~ summon minecraft:item ~ ~2 ~ {CustomName:"bd",CustomNameVisible:0,Tags:["bd"],Item:{id:"minecraft:ice",Count:1b,Damage:0s},PickupDelay:32767s,Age:-32767s,NoGravity:1b}
命令方块7：/execute @e[tag=bh] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[type=item,tag=bd,c=1] @e[tag=bh,c=1]
命令方块8：/execute @a[tag=bs3] ~ ~ ~ effect @e[r=7,tag=!bs3] 2 4 29 true
命令方块9：/scoreboard players tag @a[tag=bs2] remove bs3
命令方块10：/scoreboard players add @a[tag=bs2] bhtime 1
命令方块11：/give @a[tag=bs2,score_bhtime_min=260] minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {display:{Name:"冰霜剑",Lore:["Q键技能：冰封附近生物"]}}
命令方块12：/scoreboard players tag @a[score_bhtime_min=260] remove bs2
命令方块13：/scoreboard players reset @a[score_bhtime_min=260] bhtime
命令方块14：/scoreboard players add @e[type=item,tag=bd] ice 1
命令方块15：/kill @e[type=item,tag=bd,score_ice_min=88]
命令方块16：/scoreboard players tag @e remove bh复制代码
